summary: Gallery application with file organization system
architectural_notes: Gallery displays uploaded files with 'Unorganized' indicator until moved to Folder or Mission
Live Stack Inbox positioned at bottom-right with 3-5px diagonal offset between cards
Slide animation (200-250ms) moves files from Gallery to Stack after upload
Badge displays count of unorganized files in Stack
Files removed from Stack when organized into Folder or Mission

existing_features.title: When a file upload completes, display the file normally in the Gallery, then immediately animate it with a 200-250ms slide animation toward a small stack positioned in the bottom-right corner of the Gallery view
Display the stack in the bottom-right corner of the Gallery with a subtle 3-5px diagonal offset between stacked file cards to create a layered visual effect
Show a badge on the stack displaying the count of unorganized files currently in the inbox
Display an 'Unorganized' indicator on files in the Gallery that have not yet been moved to a Folder or Mission
When a file is moved to a Folder or Mission, remove it from the Live Stack Inbox and remove its 'Unorganized' indicator in the Gallery
Ensure the Live Stack Inbox does not interfere with normal Gallery usage, interactions, or navigation
Apply a professional, non-playful visual style to the Live Stack Inbox, stack animations, and unorganized indicators

new_feature_requests.summary: Live Stack Inbox system for newly uploaded files in gallery with slide animation to bottom-right stack, badge count, and unorganized indicator

projectName: Add Live Stack Inbox for newly uploaded files
